segments.text: What kind of job are you interested in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want a job in which I can use English , I would also like to be able to have some responsibility in my work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really appreciate that I would expect my secretary to be able to work independently and take over some of my ordinary responsibilities , such as answering routine correspondence , taking phone calls for me and sometimes assisting me with personal affairs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I see . In my previous job , I did typing and filing everyday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you had any experience as a guide ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , not exactly , but I have shown some of my foreign friends around Beijing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Once in a while we have visitors from abroad and I would like to be able to ask my secretary to take them shopping and sightseeing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I would like that .
segments.speaker: S2
